title: Narrative Inquiry of Biblical Texts: Project-Based Learning Through Dialogue with Science in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Biblical Knowledge and Scientific Reasoning Skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on creative problem-solving through collaborative learning and digital tool utilization among students.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze biblical texts according to narrative structure (conflict-complication-clue-climax-resolution) and connect them to scientific reasoning
Learners can produce outcomes exploring the scientific and ethical implications of biblical stories through team-based projects
Learners can create presentation materials integrating narrative biblical interpretation and scientific data using digital tools (BYOD)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
